strapiPost.title: Explore the Flavors of Northwest Arkansas During the 4th Annual Tour De Tacos
strapiPost.content:
The 4th Annual Tour de Tacos starts rolling this Saturday, Sep 9, bringing riders together around the love of cycling and food for a great cause!

Support: All rides start and finish at JUNK Brands in Bentonville and benefit women and families seeking economic independence through Dress for Success. Day-of-event registration will open at 6a on Saturday, so the last-minute tacos enthusiasts can still get in on the fun!

Taco â€™bout Fun: Tour de Tacos includes 62, 30, and 7-mile bike rides along the Razorback Greenway, with restaurants and businesses set up along the path to provide cyclists food and hydration. A Block Party will be set up at the finish line, where you can enjoy taco vendors, drinks, live music, and community booths.

Learn more HERE.
